_metadata.description: agent-dashboard operational requirements mapped to canonical PRD v2.0

requirements.title: Discover all agents across resources
requirements.description: Enumerate agents across all installed Vrooli resources via resource CLI.

requirements.title: Display real-time agent status
requirements.description: Show active/inactive/error states with auto-refresh every 30 seconds.

requirements.title: Show agent metadata
requirements.description: Display PID, uptime, command, capabilities for each agent.

requirements.title: Basic agent control
requirements.description: Stop agents via resource CLI integration.

requirements.title: Real-time log viewer
requirements.description: Log viewer with follow capability and streaming support.

requirements.title: Auto-refresh polling
requirements.description: Poll every 30 seconds with rate limiting to avoid resource overload.

requirements.title: Cyberpunk-themed UI
requirements.description: Cyberpunk theme with scan animations and Matrix-inspired aesthetics.

requirements.title: Radar view with agent visualization
requirements.description: Radar with moving dots and color-coded health status.

requirements.title: Agent cards with metrics
requirements.description: Display memory, CPU metrics when available from resource CLI.

requirements.title: Radar hover tooltips
requirements.description: Tooltips showing agent details on radar hover.

requirements.title: Agent search and filtering
requirements.description: Filter by name, type, or status with real-time search.

requirements.title: Log export functionality
requirements.description: Download/export log files for offline analysis.

requirements.title: Keyboard shortcuts
requirements.description: Shortcuts for common operations with help modal (press ?).

requirements.title: Responsive design
requirements.description: Works on different screen sizes with mobile-friendly layout.

requirements.title: Multiple log viewers
requirements.description: Open multiple log viewers simultaneously for comparison.

requirements.title: Agent capability discovery
requirements.description: Search agents by capability for intelligent routing.

requirements.title: Custom radar themes
requirements.description: Multiple theme options with localStorage persistence.

requirements.title: Agent grouping by resource
requirements.description: Group agents by resource type for organized viewing.
